|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "50-T6200000-30", "Rev:D", and "T62" are silkscreened on board bottom
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Texas Instruments]] TMX320 (DM8148) @1GHz :ARM (Cortex-A8), 256KB L2 cache with [https://www.ti.com/ds_dgm/images/fbd_sprs647e.gif ''Neon'' FPU] *GPU: PowerVR SGX530 (OpenGL ES2.0, OpenCL 1.1) *Video: DVI-I Dual Link, DVI-D Dual Link ports *Storage: [[Samsung]] 512MB (SLC NAND) Flash *Memory: [[Nanya]] 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 1x GbE port *USB: 4x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 5V/3A via barrel
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> Atrust t62 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom Atrust t62 Top.jpeg|Board Top </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
